Description: Ostracon (?), large section of the rim of a red pottery bowl (?), the fabric is orange and grey in section, the outer surface is covered with a red slip, the interior is partly encrusted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, there is one line of incised Coptic text around the exterior.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394323) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394323)
